title: Audit a Third-Party Logistics (3PL) Provider
description: An operational auditor reviews the performance of the company's primary 3PL provider.

tasks.description: Review the SLA in the 3PL contract, focusing on the metrics for on-time delivery and order accuracy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor understands the performance standards the vendor is supposed to meet.

tasks.description: Analyze the 3PL's performance reports for the last 12 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor finds that on-time delivery has been below the SLA target of 98% for the last 4 months.

tasks.description: Calculate any penalties or service credits due to the company as a result of the SLA breach.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor determines the company is owed service credits and recommends they be claimed.
